Articles.Content:
I just modded KSP and I can't rule out what's causing this issue. I've uninstalled both NearConstruction and FreeIVA and the error still occurs. Any idea to what's causing this?
 

Loading has failed due to an unhandled error

Failure in subsystem: Internal spaces compilation
Space: FreeIva/NearFutureConstruction/truss-octo-crew-01-iva/truss-octo-crew-01-iva

System.ArgumentNullException: Value cannot be null.
Parameter name: shader
  at (wrapper managed-to-native) UnityEngine.Material.CreateWithShader(UnityEngine.Material,UnityEngine.Shader)
  at UnityEngine.Material..ctor (UnityEngine.Shader shader) [0x00008] in <12e76cd50cc64cf19e759e981cb725af>:0 
  at FreeIva.Utils.GetDepthMaskCullingMaterial () [0x00012] in <57dce1e97df347adb43c0ec6a13fffd9>:0 
  at FreeIva.InternalModuleFreeIva.OnLoad_DepthMasks () [0x0029c] in <57dce1e97df347adb43c0ec6a13fffd9>:0 
  at FreeIva.InternalModuleFreeIva.OnLoad (ConfigNode node) [0x0009b] in <57dce1e97df347adb43c0ec6a13fffd9>:0 
  at InternalModule.Load (ConfigNode node) [0x00031] in <4b449f2841f84227adfaad3149c8fdba>:0 
  at InternalProp.AddModule (ConfigNode node) [0x0005b] in <4b449f2841f84227adfaad3149c8fdba>:0 
  at InternalModel.AddPropModule (ConfigNode node) [0x00057] in <4b449f2841f84227adfaad3149c8fdba>:0 
  at InternalModel.Load (ConfigNode node) [0x0008b] in <4b449f2841f84227adfaad3149c8fdba>:0 
  at PartLoader.LoadInternalSpace (UrlDir+UrlConfig urlConf) [0x000d1] in <4b449f2841f84227adfaad3149c8fdba>:0 
  at PartLoader+<CompileInternalSpaces>d__79.MoveNext () [0x000c3] in <4b449f2841f84227adfaad3149c8fdba>:0 
  at KSPCommunityFixes.Performance.KSPCFFastLoader+<FrameUnlockedCoroutine>d__63.MoveNext () [0x0006c] in <d08a67791ddc409fad78e1e6485c71dc>:0
Are you sure you really removed FreeIVA? The exception is happening on a FreeIVA code...
